title: how does bonus shield work?
body:
if i get a mikaels, ardent, redemption for 40% and im playing lulu, is it 40% of base or is it 40% of total shield power?  do all 3 stack?

how does the calculation work for lulu shield? ty

also is there a max shield limit?  what if i have the reviatlize rune with it the 5% and 10% less than 40% rune

replies.body: If its the same passive. It dosent stack
If it's a Named passive, it does not stack.

The only cap on Heal/Shield power is how many sources of it you have. 
Soraka R will a Dcap and the right build can heal entire health pools of squishier champs.
